name: KARNATAKA HEMOPHILIA SOCIETY

address: No 1138 Ring Road, S Nijalingappa Layout,  Near Sharadamba Temple

briefDescription: Karnataka Hemophilia Society, Davangere (KHS) is a Non-Profit Organization working for the welfare of Persons with Hemophilia (PwH) and related Bleeding Disorders since 1990. It is registered under Society’s Act, 1860. KHS has identified 704 Hemophilics till now who are registered as Life Members & caters Diagnosis, Treatment and Rehabilitation services to the patients referred from different parts of the state.  KHS is successful in Advocating with State Government, Philanthropists and Celebrities to build “Karnataka Hemophilia Care & Hematology Research Centre” equipping Administrative Block, Diagnostic Laboratory, Blood Bank, Physiotherapy Unit, OP/IP Ward, Female Ward, Transfusion Unit, Counselling & Training Hall.

address: No 1138 Ring road, S Nijalingappa Layout,
